column4: Okay Xmas_kaiser: I put it on the pastebin, would you be so kind as to take a look?
anyway http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/6113 are the settings I use for NAT, and it doesn't work with these settings, ping goes through without any problems, I did setup the DNS addresses etc..
why is your public IP your default gatewaqy?
for some strange reason my internet connection didn't work
my system probably assumed that eth0 was a primary interface or smth...
so why don't you try setting it to your router or something?
ok here is how it works my ubuntu machine is connected to the internet with eth1 directly, and eth0 is my home LAN network
Xmas_kaiser: k I guesss I'll try
hmm...so you don't have internet access directly right now?
but computers from my home LAN can't connect to the internet
